edu.bu.segrelab.comets
Class CometsMenuBar

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JMenuBar
                  edu.bu.segrelab.comets.CometsMenuBar
All Implemented Interfaces:
CometsConstants, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.MenuElement
public class CometsMenuBar
extends javax.swing.JMenuBar
implements CometsConstants

A JMenuBar extension to handle the main menus in COMETS.

This was made into a separate class to keep the Comets base class uncluttered.

Also, this way, a simple call to setMode will enable/disable the right menus/menuItems.

Author:
Bill Riehl
See Also:
Serialized Form

Constructor Detail

CometsMenuBar

public CometsMenuBar(Comets c,
                     int startingMode)
Initializes the menu bar to be used by a given Comets main class. The startingMode parameter should be either CometsConstants.SETUP_MODE or CometsConstants.SIMULATION_MODE.

Parameters:
c - - the Comets object that will be making use of this menu bar.
startingMode - - the initial mode of this menu bar
Method Detail

setMode

public void setMode(int mode)
Switches mode between setup and simulation. Expects one of two parameters: CometsConstants.SETUP_MODE = turn on setup/layout mode menu options. CometsConstants.SIMULATION_MODE = turn on simulation mode menu options. Options are enabled/disabled according to the mode.

Parameters:
mode -

setSpaceInfoActive

public void setSpaceInfoActive(boolean b)
Sets the space info checkbox menu item to be either checked or unchecked. A little clunky, but this works out okay because the info frames are nonmodal.

Parameters:
b -

setModelInfoActive

public void setModelInfoActive(boolean b)
Sets the model info checkbox menu item to be either checked or unchecked. A little clunky, but this works out okay because the info frames are nonmodal.

Parameters:
b -
